DOC.brief_summary: Introduction : Native magnetic resonance angiography ( MRA ) recommend assess thoracic aorta pregnancy , avoid risk ionise radiation contrast agent administration . This guidance however , base consensus opinion support limited case report ( level evidence C ) . Aim : To evaluate feasibility perform native 3D steady-state free-precession ( SSFP ) MRA pregnant subject inherit aortopathy guide time mode delivery .
